customModal.instructions.dt: Enter ΔT values between {min} and {max} °C, separated by semicolons (e.g., 7.5; 12; 22).

customModal.error.range: Some values are out of range.
axes.title: Axes
axes.error: Please enter positive numbers with each Min < Max.
